dc_title_s: Geologic map of the Ortigalita Peak NW and Charleston School quadrangles, Merced and Fresno counties, California
dc_description_s: by Thomas W. Dibblee, Jr. ; edited by John A. Minch. Relief shown by contours and spot heights. "Topographic base map from available USGS 7.5-minute quadrangle Ortigalita Peak NW, CA 1969, photorevised 1984, DMA 1857 IV NW -- series V895 ; Charleston School, CA 1956, photorevised 1971, DMA 1857 IV NN -- series V895 ." "First printing, June 2007." Includes location map, index to adjacent 7.5 minute quadrangles, and index to sources of geology, most recent 1974. Includes "pertinent references", most recent 1999.
dc_publisher_s: Santa Barbara Museum of Natural History
